snippet: Three people died and 10 were sickened early on Saturday after using cocaine laced with a potent pain killer in North Carolina, police said....

headline.print_headline: Three Die, 10 Sickened After Using Cocaine in North Carolina
headline.main: Three Die, 10 Sickened After Using Cocaine in North Carolina

lead_paragraph: Three people died and 10 were sickened early on Saturday after using cocaine laced with a potent pain killer in North Carolina, police said.
